data.message: I changed my Facebook name some time ago with a celebrity name Kıvanç Tatlıtuğ but now it is permanent and i can't change it.. it's not my real name.. Help !!!

replies.message: Hey Kivanc. You can change your name by following these 5 easy steps from our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/173909489329079?sr=3&query=change%20name&sid=0UPSfmr554HHtrLDX. Remember, to help make sure everyone uses their authentic name, you can only change your name every 60 days. -Hailey
it shows that" you can't change your name because you have already changed it too many times"... Help !!!!
